name: CONVERGER
description:
Churned out in seven days for 7DRL 2021. Probably buggy as hell but I think the main loop works!

*AHEM*

The far right knows their number is up. As usual, they've decided to do a bunch of hateful shit and blame the left. Luckily, the punks are onto them.

Take to the streets with yr pals and battle a repulsive smorgasbord of fascists: cops, nazis, technocrats, preppers, lone gunmen, and cyberdogs.

Survive fourteen nights of fisticuffs, bonfires, toxic waste spills, and incendiary devices. If you make it, lay the groundwork for a hopefully less awful world. If you don't, brush up on yr anarchist theory and try again. In the immortal words of someone, don't stop til every nazi skull is crushed!

(CONVERGER is an extremely bad name but makes "sense" because most of this code is cribbed from VERGER, another game I'm chipping away it. Just let me have this, OK?)

*NOTE: If you just want to play the game, please download the latest version (0.2 as of this moment). If you're a juror for 7DRL and want the original build uploaded for the jam, it's 0.1. thanks!
